channel.title: PROJECTS on RAFAL MAJCHERCZYK
channel.description: Recent content in PROJECTS on RAFAL MAJCHERCZYK

item.title: FIFA World Cup 2022 Fan Dashboard
item.description: In the second half of November 2022, I started looking for an interesting data project idea. I did some research and brainstorming and compiled a list of potential topics that I could dive into when, all of a sudden, the FIFA World Cup 2022 started. Watching first matches and observing football fans from all over the world reveling in the World Cup fever I slowly started getting hooked as well. In order to celebrate this event I decided to put in practice my SQL, Python, and Tableau skills and design a dashboard in Tableau Public which would tell a story of our favourite teams.

item.title: FIFA World Cup 2022 Predictive Model (article under construction)
item.description: Article is currently under construction. However, the model which is the main topic of this post is already available on my Github account.
